metadata.description: Complete MCE operations guide consolidating all helpers.
critical_notes: For creating editable emails, ALWAYS use REST API with assetType.id = 207 (templatebasedemail)
The assetType.id = 208 (htmlemail) creates non-editable paste emails and should be avoided for template-based designs
Data Extensions MUST be linked to Contact Model for Journey filters to work

asset_creation.description: Creating editable, template-based email assets via REST API.

working_example.comment: This is a simplified example. For the full required structure, refer to docs/mce-editable-emails-llm.md

118077.cause: Using an incorrect ID or missing the name
118077.solution: Ensure assetType is { 'id': 207, 'name': 'templatebasedemail' } for editable emails.

for_llms.email_creation: Use mce_v1_rest_request POST /asset/v1/content/assets with assetType: { id: 207, name: 'templatebasedemail' }. See docs/mce-editable-emails-llm.md for the full required JSON structure.
for_llms.journey_filters: Data Extension MUST be linked to Contact Model.
